hypothesis: (s-001) Each player is either a Knight (always tells truth), Knave (always lies), or Spy (can lie or tell truth)
(s-002) Olivia says: Alice and I have the same role
(s-003) Alice says: I am a spy
(s-004) Ivy says: Alice and I have the same role
(s-005) There is exactly one spy among all players
(s-006) There is a unique solution to the puzzle
objectives: Determine the role of each player: Olivia, Alice, and Ivy
progresses: (s-007) The unique solution: Olivia=Knave, Alice=Spy, Ivy=Knave

cot: s-007 proves via exhaustive case analysis that the unique solution is: Olivia=Knave, Alice=Spy, Ivy=Knave
This directly answers the objective of determining each player's role
solution.full: The objective is directly answered by statement s-007 (status=true): The unique solution to the puzzle is Olivia is a Knave, Alice is a Spy, and Ivy is a Knave. This completely determines the role of each player as required.
